metadata.title: CVE-2021-42860 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** A stack buffer overflow exists in Mini-XML v3.2. Wheninputting an unformed XML string to the mxmlLoadString API, it will cause astack-buffer-overflow in mxml_string_getc:2611. NOTE: it is unclear whetherthis input is allowed by the API specification.

criterions.comment: mxml package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
